info.name: Utility Lookup API
info.description:
API for looking up utility providers (electric, gas, water) by address.

Base URL: https://web-production-9acc6.up.railway.app

Authentication: Include X-API-Key header with all requests.

request.description: Check if the API is running.

query.description: Comma-separated list: electric, gas, water, trash, sewer, internet

request.description: Look up all utility providers for a single address.
Look up only electric provider for an address.
Look up only water provider for an address.

Look up utilities for multiple addresses in a single request.

**Limits:**
- Max 500 addresses per request
- 50 concurrent workers internally
- 1-hour cache for repeated addresses

**Request Body:**
- `addresses`: Array of address strings (required)
- `utilities`: Comma-separated list of utility types (optional, defaults to all)

body.raw:
{
  "addresses": [
    "100 Congress Ave, Austin, TX 78701",

Generate a new API key. Requires admin secret.
Validate an API key and check remaining usage.
